Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In these updates by various people we see a range of stories that capture the pulse of the nation. From concerns around the base rate of JobSeeker payments to rescue operations off WA's coast the news is varied and insightful. We also see debates around the policies of central banks and the economic outlook and calls for the government to do more to support those struggling in the wake of the pandemic. With uncertainty and challenges still prevalent it's clear that we all need to stay informed and stay connected to the latest developments.
